about_the_game:
After purchasing this DLC, the official cheat function will be displayed in the game Crazy Flasher 7 Mercenary Empire (stand-alone Version).
After entering the game, there will be a button with a wrench icon at the top of the screen to open the cheat function.
The official cheater features include:
1. Get a lot of gold coins and K points easily.
2. Easily obtain any item in the game, including weapons or equipment or materials, etc.
3. Kill the enemy with one key, pass the level with one key, unlock the level with one key, etc.
4. Easily summon any soldiers, any number (if there are too many computer cards), any camp (enemy or friendly).
